metadata.title: CVE-2016-1245 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
It was discovered that the zebra daemon in Quagga before 1.0.20161017suffered from a stack-based buffer overflow when processing IPv6 NeighborDiscovery messages. The root cause was relying on BUFSIZ to be compatiblewith a message size; however, BUFSIZ is system-dependent.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-1245` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

quagga - 0.99.22.4-3ubuntu1.3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: quagga package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.99.22.4-3ubuntu1.3').
